mapper.select: SELECT * FROM sys_dict WHERE deleted = 0 ORDER BY type, sort, updatetime DESC
SELECT type FROM sys_dict WHERE deleted = 0 GROUP BY type ORDER BY type
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_dict( id, value, label, type, description, sort, createuser, createtime, updateuser, updatetime, remarks, deleted ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{value}, #{label}, #{type}, #{description}, #{sort}, #{createBy.id}, #{createtime}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updatetime}, #{remarks}, #{deleted} )
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_dict SET value = #{value}, label = #{label}, type = #{type}, description = #{description}, sort = #{sort}, updateuser = #{updateBy.id}, updatetime = #{updatetime}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
